channel.title: disentangling on Zijie Wang`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in disentangling on Zijie Wang`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] On Transfer of Inductive Bias from Simulation to RW (NeurIPS 2019)

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] Learning Feature Disentang. and Dynamic Fusion (CVPRW 2022)
item.description: Learning Feature Disentanglement and Dynamic Fusion for Recaptured Image Forensic (CVPRW 2022) 概述 Image Recapture Forensic 任务。 四种需要识别的模式 moire edge artifact other 本文提出一种特征解耦与动态融合模型 (Feature Disentanglement and Dynamic Fusion model, FDDF)，并构建了一个大规

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] Blobgan: Spatially Disentangled Scene Representations (ECCV 2022)
item.description: Blobgan: Spatially Disentangled Scene Representations (ECCV 2022) 开源代码传送门 概述 本文为场景生成模型提出一种无监督的中间级别表征。

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] Learning Debiased Representation via DFA (NeurIPS 2021)

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] Where and What? Examining Interpretable DR (CVPR 2021)
item.description: Where and What? Examining Interpretable Disentangled Representations (CVPR 2021) 看源代码传送门 概述 从三方面评估解耦 Informativeness Independence Interpretability 一个问题 能否在没有监督的情况下要求特征的可解释性？ 两个假设 Spatial Constriction : A representation is usually interpretable if we can consistently

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] Neural Discrete Representation Learning (NIPS 2017)
item.description: Neural Discrete Representation Learning (NIPS 2017) 概述 考古一下 VQ-VAE。 模型架构 可视化示例

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] Isolating Sources of Disentanglement in VAEs (NeurIPS 2018)
item.description: Isolating Sources of Disentanglement in VAEs (NeurIPS 2018) 概述 本文提出一种互信息鸿沟 (Mutual Information Gap, IMP) 评价机制。 $$\frac{1}{K} \sum_{k=1}^{K} \frac{1}{H(v_{k})} (I_{n}(z_{j^{(k)}}; v_{k}) - max_{j \ne j^{(k)}} I_{n}(z_{j}; v_{k})).$$

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 特征解耦] Disentangling by Factorising (ICML 2018)
item.description: Disentangling by Factorising (ICML 2018) 概述 本文定义并尝试解决无监督的特征结构问题，并提出了 Factor-VAE。 Factor-VAE 架构 新的评价机制
